channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 22:34 Air alert in Zhytomyr region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🔴 22:34 Air alert in Zhytomyr region. Follow further messages. #Zhytomyr_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 22:26 Threat of artillery shelling in Pokrovska territorial community has been eliminated. Please note, the alert is still ongoing in:- Dnipropetrovsk region
item.description: 🟡 22:26 Threat of artillery shelling in Pokrovska territorial community has been eliminated.
